document.full_text: bahrain suspended the gulf arab state's main opposition newspaper on sunday, after accusing it of falsifying news about sectarian unrest and a government crackdown on protests.
document.title: bahrain says suspends opposition paper over "lies"
lines_and_colors: bahrain suspended the gulf arab state's main opposition newspaper on sunday, after accusing it of falsifying news about sectarian unrest and a government crackdown on protests.
